column2:
"If I were to pick one weapon that fits the
Hunter perfectly, it'd have to be the sword."

"Big and sturdy, yet still easy to wield.
It's a great all-around weapon."

"But even a simple weapon like the sword takes
time to get used to. You really need to use one
in the field to get a feel for it."

"It just so happens I have a spare gigush
lying around. Take it and go practice a bit."

"Swords are standard melee weapons that
are easy to use, even for beginners."

"Try basic sword attacks and photon arts for yourself.

For a close-room weapon, a sword has good reach and
is straightforward to use, making it perfect for learning
the basics of combat."
